Image: IDG

Amazon’s second Prime Day sale is now here and from October 8 to midnight on October 9, you’ll be able to score some of the best deals on Apple devices this side of Black Friday. All of Apple’s tablets, from the newest iPad Air and Pro to the mini and 10th-gen iPad will see some of their best prices ever.

The iPads picked here are all chosen by our editors, who have decades of experience with Apple devices. We’ve reviewed everything we recommend and we won’t tell you to buy something that’s not an actual deal. The products below are all at or near all-time lows, and we’ve selected what we think is the best configuration for each product type. We know Apple is expensive, so we’ve chosen products at prices we would be willing to pay, so you can trust that our recommendations will steer you in the right direction—and save you big bucks.

Of course, Prime Day isn’t just for iPads. If you’re looking for a new Mac, Apple Watch, storage or display to go with your Mac, check out our separate round-up of the best Amazon Prime Apple deals.

Best iPad deals of Prime Day

Some deals are better than others, here are the bigger savings to be had on a new iPad this Prime Day. Look below this section for more deals on the different iPad models from iPad mini to iPad Pro.

U.S. iPad Prime Day deals

  • 9th-gen iPad (64 GB, with AppleCare): $258 ($140 off, MSRP $398) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • 9th-gen iPad (64GB): $199 ($130 off, Was $329, DISCONTINUED)
  • iPad mini (64GB): $350 ($149 off, MSRP $499) PRIME EXCLUSIVE DEAL
  • iPad mini (64GB, Cellular): $500 ($149 off, MSRP $649) PRIME BIG DEAL
  • 11-inch M2 iPad Air (128GB): $545 ($54 off, MSRP $599)
  • 13-inch M2 iPad Air (128GB): $749 ($50 off, MSRP $799)
  • 11-inch M4 iPad Pro (512GB): $1,049 with coupon ($149 off, MSRP $1,199)
  • 13-inch M4 iPad Pro (256GB): $1,150 ($149 off with coupon, MSRP $1,299)
  • 13-inch M4 iPad Pro (512GB): $1,350 ($149 off with coupon, MSRP $1,499)

U.K. iPad Prime Day deals

  • 10th-gen iPad (64GB): £319 (£30 off, RRP £349)
  • 10th gen iPad (256GB): £469 (£30 off, RRP £499)
  • 6th-gen iPad mini: £468.97 (£29.03 off, RRP £499)
  • 11-inch iPad Air (M2): £559.97 (£39.03 off, RRP £599)
  • 13-inch iPad Air (M2): £749.97 (£49.03 off, RRP £799)

For more standard iPad deals from other stockists and resellers take a look at the following deals round-ups that we update monthly:

  • 10th-gen iPad deals.
  • iPad mini deals.
  • iPad Air deals.
  • iPad Pro deals.

Dominik Tomaszewski / Foundry

Prime Day 2024: Best iPad accessory sales

Grab a bargain on an accessory to go with your new iPad.

U.S. iPad accessory Prime Day deals

  • Apple Pencil (1st gen): $79 ($20 off, MSRP $99)
  • Apple Pencil (2nd gen): $90 ($39 off, MSRP $129)
  • Apple Pencil (USB-C): $67 ($12 off, MSRP $79)
  • Apple Pencil Pro: $98 ($31 off, MSRP $129)
  • Apple Magic Keyboard (11-inch): $249 ($50 off, MSRP $299)
  • Apple Magic Keyboard (13-inch): $318 ($31 off, MSRP $349)
  • Apple MagSafe Charger (2m): $44 ($5 off, MSRP $49)
  • AirTag (4-pack): $80 ($19 off, MSRP $99)
  • AirTag (single): $25 ($4 off, MSRP $29)

U.K. iPad accessory Prime Day deals

  • Magic Keyboard (for 12.9-inch iPad Pro – 5th generation): £289 (£60, RRP was £349)
  • Magic Keyboard Folio for iPad (10th generation): £204 (£45 off, RRP £249)
  • Magic Keyboard for iPad Pro 11-inch (1st-4th gen) and iPad Air (4th-5th generation): £278.95 (£20, RRP £299)
  • Apple Pencil (1st Generation): £79 (£20 off, RRP £99 )
  • Apple Pencil (2nd Generation): £94 (£35 off, RRP £129)
  • Apple Pencil (USB-C): £64 (£15 off, RRP £79)

Prime Day 2024: How can I get the best iPad deals?

Many Prime Day deals will be exclusive for Prime members, so you’ll need to sign in for a membership if you don’t already have one. Prime memberships cost $139/£95/AU$79 annually, or $14.99/£8.99/AU$6.99 every month. New users can sign up for a 30-day free trial that can be canceled at any time during the trial window. As well Prime Day sales prices, Prime members also get free two-day shipping and access to Prime Video and all the content available on that service.

Prime Day 2024: Our favorite deals

We’ve been tracking iPad deals for years and know a good one when we see it. Throughout the Prime Day sale, we constantly check Amazon’s listings to find the best deals. We’ve tested all of the models we recommend here and only select the very best deals for publication—so if you see an iPad listed here, you’ll know it’s at or near its all-time low price. And it’s not just iPads. For more Amazon Prime Day coverage, check out our other Apple deal roundups:
